dcterms:creator: A. Rekik
A. Ben-Hamadou
W. Mahdi
dcterms:description: The MIRACL-VC1 dataset consists of 10 speakers speaking 10 different words, 10 times each. It has been split into different sections for various forms of testing and validation, including unseen data for robustness against different person cases.
dcterms:title: MIRACL-VC1

dcterms:description: The collated dataset consists of videos obtained from smartphone cameras taken under varying conditions, including different lighting and backgrounds.
dcterms:title: Collated Dataset
